body:
Comment 1: 
Three things I see right away, for command-line mode;

corpus.Init does:

        c.updateMetadata()
	go c.refreshMetadataLoop()

Which isn't needed.

Oh, it also does c.initFSTree which I doubt is needed in command-line mode.

Also, readTemplates reads a bunch of HTML templates which aren't needed.

etc.

I bet a lot of this happened before too, though I'm sure we made some parts worse in the
process of breaking this up.
